name: Eiffel Tower

description: World's largest art museum housing the Mona Lisa.

description: Ancient Buddhist temple in the heart of Asakusa.

description: Tallest structure in Japan with observation decks.

description: World's busiest pedestrian crossing in vibrant Shibuya.

name: Meiji Shrine
description: Serene Shinto shrine surrounded by forest.

name: Statue of Liberty
description: Iconic symbol of freedom on Liberty Island.

name: Central Park
description: Massive urban park in the heart of Manhattan.

name: Times Square
description: Bright lights and bustling energy in Midtown.

name: Brooklyn Bridge
description: Historic suspension bridge connecting Manhattan and Brooklyn.

name: Sagrada Familia
description: Gaudí's masterpiece basilica, still under construction.

description: Colorful park with mosaics and architecture by Gaudí.

description: Famous tree-lined pedestrian street.

name: Burj Khalifa

name: Dubai Mall
description: Massive shopping center with aquarium and entertainment.

name: Dubai Marina

name: Big Ben
description: Iconic clock tower at the Palace of Westminster.

name: Tower Bridge
description: Victorian bascule bridge over the River Thames.

name: British Museum
description: World-famous museum of human history and culture.

name: Buckingham Palace
description: Official residence of the British monarch.

name: Colosseum
description: Ancient amphitheater and iconic symbol of Rome.

name: Vatican City
description: Smallest country with St. Peter's Basilica and the Sistine Chapel.

name: Trevi Fountain
description: Baroque fountain famous for coin-tossing tradition.

name: Sydney Opera House
